3 cream cheese, softened,1/4 cup powdered sugar,1 cup unsalted butter, melted and cooled slightly,3/4 cup granulated sugar,1/4 cup packed light brown sugar,1 large egg, at room temperature,1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract,2 3/4 cups all-purpose flour,1/2 teaspoon baking powder,1/2 teaspoon baking soda,1/4 teaspoon kosher salt,1 cup freeze-dried strawberries,,
